iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Dominica
iati-activity.description: The implementation of Nesting Beach Monitoring -Anti Poaching Patrol and Census- at Bout Sable Beach in the La Plaine area and on the West Coast Beaches. Beach Patrollers will be equipped with Patrolling equipment including headlamps, flashlights, tagging pliers, tags, measuring tapes, covered clipboard with data forms, pencil and raincoats. The purpose of these patrols is to ensure an anti-poaching presence on the beach. Enabling community members to become tour guides and develop the sustainable non-consumptive use of turtles by conducting turtle watching tours. The implementation of an Outreach and Education Programme including school presentations (6 visits); poster design, printing and distribution in support of beach patrols, turtle tour guiding and turtle watching tours and turtle education programmes and Radio Programmes.
